sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均有"确实地，真正地"之意。
means: indeed ： 一般用于肯定或证实对方所说的话，多承接前言，也用来加强或肯定自己说话的语气。
really ： 主要用于强调与事实或现实不相违背，也可表示不快、惊奇或某种含蓄的怀疑。
truly ： 强调客观存在的真实性，没有任何虚假。
actually ： 侧重于实际的事，而不是凭空想象或推测的事。

sentence.Network_en: The Europeans had hoped to win, and, indeed, had looked like winning.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧洲人早就想赢了，而且他们看上去的确是一副要赢的样子。

sentence.Network_en: The mere mention of John had touched a very raw nerve indeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 提到约翰就真的让人心痛。

sentence.Network_en: It rapidly became apparent that rock'n'roll was a very broad church indeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 摇滚乐实际无所不包，这一点很快就显而易见了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 允字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 用,使用〖 use〗 确实,果真〖 indeed〗 允 yǔn.
字典中恂字的解释 ... (5) 畅通[ unimpeded] 的确;确实[ indeed] (2) 同本义[ trust].
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... incorrect a. 不正确的 ，错误的 indeed a. 确实； 实在 independence n. 独立.
最新英语新课标必修3英语单词表_百度知道 ... in time 及时；终于 indeed adv. 真正地；确实；实在 independence n. 独立；自主.

list.abs: ...复合连接词（whenever, whereas），复合副词（indeed, moreover），复合代词（myself, another），复合数词（twenty-five, nine-t…
And I say that life is indeed darkness save when there is urge ., 我说生命的确是黑暗的 , 除非是有了激励.
If you doubt yourself , then indeed you stand on shaky ground ., 如果你怀疑自己 , 那么你的确站在了不稳定的地方.
BLOW ME... ... Yooooou 是的我要得到你 Yes indeed 我是认真的 But this is what you get from me 而且这也是你将得到的.
肯尼．杜翰(Tommy Dorsey), 《真正赞同(Yes Indeed)》 (Bluebird)罗伊．艾尔迪奇(Roy Eldridge), 《小爵士(Little Jazz)》 (Columbia) …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: originally as in deed

entry.def: You use indeed to confirm or agree with something that has just been said.

example.ex: Later, he admitted that the payments had indeed been made...
example.tran: 后来,他承认确实付过款了。

example.ex: He did indeed keep important documents inside his hat...
example.tran: 他确实把重要文件放在了他的帽子里。

entry.tran: (表示语气的递进)实际上,其实,确切说来
entry.def: You use indeed to introduce a further comment or statement which strengthens the point you have already made.

example.ex: We have nothing against diversity; indeed, we want more of it...
example.tran: 我们一点都不抵触多样化;实际上,我们需要多样性更丰富一些。

example.ex: When we asked to see more we were refused. Indeed we were escorted away by men with guns.
example.tran: 当我们要求进一步参观时却被拒绝了。实际上，我们是被一些带枪的人护送离开的。

entry.tran: (位于句末修饰very或强调某词)确实,实在
entry.def: You use indeed at the end of a clause to give extra force to the word 'very', or to emphasize a particular word.

example.ex: The engine began to sound very loud indeed...
example.tran: 发动机开始发出极大的声响。

example.ex: The wine was very good indeed...

entry.tran: (重复问题以作强调,尤用于答案未知时)到底,究竟
entry.def: You can use indeed as a way of repeating a question in order to emphasize it, especially when you do not know the answer.

example.ex: 'Now where are the real villains?' — 'Where indeed?'...
example.tran: “那么那些真正的恶棍在哪里？”——“是啊，到底在哪里？”

example.ex: 'And what do we do here?' — 'What, indeed?'
example.tran: “我们在这里做什么呢?”——“是啊，到底做什么?”

sentences.sentence: "they said the car would break down and indeed it did"

means.word_mean: 2. (used as an interjection) an expression of surprise or skepticism or irony etc.;

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, maybe things we once thought were unbearable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, maybe things we once thought were unbearable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, maybe things we once thought were unbearable.

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, physicists simply camped outside the auditorium instead.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, physicists simply camped outside the auditorium instead.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, physicists simply camped outside the auditorium instead.

auth_sentence.content: It makes for a formidable mission statement, indeed.
auth_sentence.res_content: It makes for a formidable mission statement, indeed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It makes for a formidable mission statement, indeed.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in使……+deed做,行为→使……做→成为现实

Sentence.sentence: He added that he had warned Mclaughlin that three preventable accidents in one year could lead to his discharge,as indeed it should.
And there was indeed a personal link.
Although that can indeed be frustrating, this is probably the only way to treat so grand a topic.

sentences.en: The possibility of rescue now seemed remote indeed.
sentences.cn: 救援的可能性的确很小。

sentences.en: She indeed lives in a fool's paradise as she always dreams about making a huge fortune overnight.
sentences.cn: 她总想一夜暴富, 的确有点想入非非。

sentences.en: I didn't mind.Indeed, I was pleased.
sentences.cn: 我不在意, 甚至还很高兴。

sentences.en: A friend in need is a friend indeed.
sentences.cn: 患难的朋友才是真正的朋友。

sentences.en: “Are you pleased at our success?”“Yes, indeed.
sentences.cn: ”“你对我们的成功感到欣慰吗?”“是的, 确实感到欣慰。”

jushi.english: “Who is this woman?”“Who is she, indeed!”
There are indeed exceptions to this rule.
jushi.chinese: 这条规则的确有很多例外。
